attributes.action: Repeal the decision on TFL to take away Uber's license to operate in London
attributes.background: I have been using uber for the last two years. I live in London and I have been in many sticky situations of which concern my security and safety. Uber has helped me numiours times allowing me to get a cab home at late times of the evening. It would be a shame to watch it go

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
